bug.author: Dreamskya
bug.description:
Before submitting a bug report, please ensure that you are using the latest versions of:
Python 3.7.6 PyTorch 1.5 This repository (run git fetch && git status -uno to check and git pull to update)
Your issue must be reproducible on a public dataset (i.e COCO) using the latest version of the repository, and you must supply code to reproduce, or we can not help you. If this is a custom training question we suggest you include your train*.jpg, test*.jpg and results.png figures. <denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
Error in training data set <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
REQUIRED: Code to reproduce your issue below <denchmark-code>python train.py --data data\rbc.data --cfg cfg\yolov3-tiny.cfg --epochs 10 </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
OS: [e.g. Ubuntu] GPU [e.g. 2080 Ti]
<denchmark-h:h2>Additional context</denchmark-h>
(base) F:\YOLOV3\yolov3-master>python train.py --data data\rbc.data --cfg cfg\yolov3-tiny.cfg --epochs 10 Namespace(adam=False, batch_size=16, bucket='', cache_images=False, cfg='cfg\yolov3-tiny.cfg', data='data\rbc.data', device='', epochs=10, evolve=False, img_size=[320, 640], multi_scale=False, name='', nosave=False, notest=False, rec t=False, resume=False, single_cls=False, weights='weights/yolov3-tiny.pt') Using CUDA Apex device0 _CudaDeviceProperties(name='GeForce GTX 1660', total_memory=6144MB) Start Tensorboard with "tensorboard --logdir=runs", view at <denchmark-link:http://localhost:6006/>http://localhost:6006/</denchmark-link>
Traceback (most recent call last): File "train.py", line 415, in train(hyp) # train normally File "train.py", line 91, in train model = Darknet(cfg).to(device) File "F:\YOLOV3\yolov3-master\models.py", line 226, in self.module_list, self.routs = create_modules(self.module_defs, img_size, cfg) File "F:\YOLOV3\yolov3-master\models.py", line 33, in create_modules bias=not bn)) File "C:\Users\Administrator\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\torch\nn\modules\conv.py", line 338, in False, _pair(0), groups, bias, padding_mode) File "C:\Users\Administrator\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\torch\nn\modules\conv.py", line 26, in if out_channels % groups != 0: TypeError: not all arguments converted during string formatting

comments.comment:
Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Dreamskya>@Dreamskya</denchmark-link> , thank you for your interest in our work! Ultralytics has open-sourced YOLOv5 at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5>https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5</denchmark-link> , featuring faster, lighter and more accurate object detection. YOLOv5 is recommended for all new projects.
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26833433/84200349-729f2680-aa5b-11ea-8f9a-604c9e01a658.png></denchmark-link>
To continue with this repo, please visit our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Training Tutorial</denchmark-link> to get started, and see our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/blob/master/tutorial.ipynb>Google Colab Notebook</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov3>Docker Image</denchmark-link> , and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/GCP-Quickstart>GCP Quickstart Guide</denchmark-link> for example environments. If this is a bug report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you. If this is a custom model or data training question, please note that Ultralytics does not provide free personal support. As a leader in vision ML and AI, we do offer professional consulting, from simple expert advice up to delivery of fully customized, end-to-end production solutions for our clients, such as:
Cloud-based AI systems operating on hundreds of HD video streams in realtime. Edge AI integrated into custom iOS and Android apps for realtime 30 FPS video inference. Custom data training, hyperparameter evolution, and model exportation to any destination.
For more information please visit <denchmark-link:https://www.ultralytics.com>https://www.ultralytics.com</denchmark-link> .
This issue is stale because it has been open 30 days with no activity. Remove Stale label or comment or this will be closed in 5 days.
